org.csstudio.platform.internal.simpledal
Class ProcessVariableConnectionService.ConnectionWorkarroundLinkListener

java.lang.Object
  org.epics.css.dal.context.LinkAdapter
      org.csstudio.platform.internal.simpledal.ProcessVariableConnectionService.ConnectionWorkarroundLinkListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, org.epics.css.dal.context.LinkListener
Enclosing class:
ProcessVariableConnectionService
 class ProcessVariableConnectionService.ConnectionWorkarroundLinkListener
extends org.epics.css.dal.context.LinkAdapter

LinkListener implementation, which adds a DynamicValueListener lazily to a DynamicValueProperty when the DynamicValueProperty is connected. This is a just a workaround, which is necessary because DynamicValueListener´s cannot be attached to DynamicValueProperty before they are connected to a channel. (//TODO: Cosylab! Please fix this!)

Author:
Sven Wende
